title: Freunde die auf der App online sind
body:
Hide-Funktion für die Riot-App

    Könnte man eine Funktion hinzufügen mit der man die Leute, die nur mit der App online, sind ausblenden kann?
    Es ist etwas irritierend wenn mir der Button sagt "30 Freunde sind online", aber nur 2 von meinen Freunden es wirklich sind.
    Ich würde einen schnellen Überblick bevorzugen bei dem man direkt sehen kann, wie viele meiner Freunde gerade bereit sind zu spielen.

    MfG Dakuon

Hi, recently I've been playing a lot of games where during champion select I suddenly get a lot of lag, and sometimes even before I get to champion select.

I'll give you two examples of what happens:

1.) I'm playing a 5v5 with my fixed team, we're all in the "searching for a game" screen, then suddenly they are all in the game, and for me it still says that I'm searching for a game. So while they're picking champions, I'm still searching for a game. So I exit LoL, and every time, the moment that it exits, I hear the gong sound which means I can enter a game, but I can't because obviously I've just quit, and then the game my team are in end because it says I've quit, plus after various attempts to get into lobby I get the time penalty for leaving of up to 15 minutes.

2.) I actually get into champion select, and we're in the banning phase. Then suddenly it looks to me like the enemies have missed a ban, but everyone else can see the ban. And it's just stuck there, I can't see what other people have picked, and it just stays in the banning phase forever. So I end up getting a random champion because I can't see what's going on.

On the occasions where I do get into a game, I have absolutely no problems with lag, and my latency is absolutely fine. So what on earth is going on, and could anybody please tell me how to fix it?
